translation.en: You are extraordinary, my sons.
Unlike anything the world has ever seen.
translation.es: El mundo jamás ha visto nada parecido.

translation.en: Bound for greatness,
destined to protect the people of New York.
translation.es: Destinados a proteger... ...a la gente de Nueva York.

translation.en: A dark force is growing,
a criminal organization known as the Foot Clan.
translation.es: Una organización criminal conocida como el Clan del Pie.

translation.en: So named because they step over the good people of this city with no regard.
translation.es: Llamada así porque pisotean sin piedad a la gente de la ciudad.

translation.en: Their leader, The Shredder,
will come at you with ferocity.
His Foot Clan will outnumber you.
translation.es: Su Clan los superará en número. La gente de Nueva York los considerará su última esperanza.

translation.en: The people of New York will look upon you as their only hope.
translation.es: La gente de Nueva York los considerará su última esperanza.

translation.en: Eyes focused.
Elbows locked.
- Stance low. -
And we begin.
Be one with the blades.
Lead their path.
I know you are eager to answer their calls,
translation.es: Sé que están ansiosos de responder a su llamado...

translation.en: but your training is not yet complete.
translation.es: ...pero su entrenamiento no se ha acabado.

translation.en: The world below must remain your home.
translation.es: El mundo subterráneo seguirá siendo su hogar.

translation.en: As your father, you must trust me.
translation.es: Como su padre... deben confiar en mí.

translation.en: Patience.
Patience.
You're not yet ready to go above ground.
translation.es: No están listos para subir a la superficie.

translation.en: But I believe when that day comes,
translation.es: Creo que cuando llegue ese día...

translation.en: and you rise to the streets,
you are going to be responsible for amazing things.
translation.es: ...van a ser responsables de cosas increíbles.

translation.en: Mr. Rivetti!
Mr. Rivetti. Mr. Rivetti, please.
You're the most persistent human I've ever met in my life, I swear.
translation.es: Eres la persona más persistente que jamás conocí.

translation.en: Look, I already told the cops everything, all right?
translation.es: Le dije a la policía todo lo que sé.

translation.en: But maybe there's a detail you could've forgotten to share with the police.
translation.es: Quizá haya un detalle que se le olvidó.

translation.en: Sweetheart, you don't forget something like that.
Ten guys storm in here, broad daylight,
translation.es: Uno no olvida algo así. 10 tipos nos ordenaron echarnos al piso. Y son químicos restringidos.

translation.en: force us to the ground at gunpoint. And these are restricted chemicals.
translation.es: 10 tipos nos ordenaron echarnos al piso. Y son químicos restringidos.

translation.en: Benzyl cyanide and some deaminating agents, too.
translation.es: Cianuro de bencilo y agentes diaminados.

translation.en: You don't just buy this stuff, even on the black market.
translation.es: No se compran, ni en el mercado negro.

translation.en: Wait, you said deaminating agents, those are used in genetic research.
translation.es: Los agentes diaminados se usan en investigación genética.

translation.en: Is there anybody else that's trafficking these sort of chemicals besides you?
translation.es: ¿Alguien más maneja esos químicos además de ustedes?

translation.en: There's one other high- security facility along this waterfront.
translation.es: Hay otra instalación de alta seguridad aquí.

translation.en: But they don't move nearly as much cargo as we do.
translation.es: Pero no maneja tanta carga como nosotros.

translation.en: O'Neil! We're live in 30 minutes! Come on!
No, no, no, I'll be right back. Please don't go anywhere. I'll be right back.
Come on, you're killing me.  I'm working.
- That's a paying job? - No. Because we have an actual paying job.
translation.es: ¿Te pagan por eso? Tenemos un trabajo pagado.

translation.en: Look, you don't think that every crime reporter in the city has been trying to work this Foot Clan story?
translation.es: Todos los reporteros están investigando al Clan del Pie.

translation.en: I know that, but there is a new angle on this, and I am this close to getting it.
translation.es: Tengo nueva información y estoy así de cerca de averiguar algo.

translation.en: I just need a couple of more...
Let's just stick to what we're good at. Let's stick to what we're good at. We're good at it.
translation.es: Hagamos lo que sabemos hacer. Nos sale bien.

translation.en: - - In five, four...
Hi, guys, this is April O'Neil from Channel 6 News,
and I am here in beautiful New York City on the first day of spring.
translation.es: ...y estoy en Nueva York el primer día de primavera.

translation.en: And you know what that means. It is time to shed that pesky winter weight.
translation.es: Es hora de quitarse ese exceso de peso invernal.

translation.en: And here with me today is celebrity fitness trainer Harley Pasternak.
translation.es: Estoy con el entrenador de celebridades Harley Pasternak.

translation.en: - Hi, Harley. - Good morning, April. Twenty years I've studied the animal kingdom.
translation.es: Llevo 20 años estudiando el reino animal.

translation.en: There are fat pigs, there are fat cows. There are no fat birds.
translation.es: Hay cerdos y vacas gordas. No hay aves gordas.

translation.en: All right, I want you to visualize a sexy seagull.
translation.es: Quiero que visualices a una gaviota sexy.

translation.en: So we're going to squat down, and flap your wings. Right over there. Full extension.
translation.es: Vamos a agacharnos y a aletear. Extiende los brazos todo lo posible.

translation.en: Picture you're leaving the cold north and you're flying. You're migrating.
translation.es: Estás dejando el frío norteño, y estás migrando.

translation.en: Four years of journalism school so that I can do that. Four years of my life, Vern.
translation.es: 4 años de estudiar periodismo para hacer eso. 4 años de mi vida.

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
Look, O'Neil, I get it, you want to be a serious journalist. I see you sniffing around the newsroom for the big stories.
translation.es: Quieres ser una periodista seria. Siempre buscas grandes noticias.

translation.en: But it's also okay to just give people something a little lighter. - A little... Little froth. - Froth?
translation.es: Pero está bien darle a la gente algo ligero, un poco de espumita.

translation.en: You know how when you get a coffee, it's just, like, coffee, then they put a little froth on it. It's kind of nice.
translation.es: Como cuando te dan un café y le ponen espumita. Es agradable.

translation.en: Vern, that's foam.
Yes, foam, froth, you get the point. It's just... It's nice, it tastes good, it's candy.
translation.es: Espuma, espumita, tú me entiendes. Sabe rico. Es como un dulce.

translation.en: You ever heard the expression, Never take candy from a baby? It's because even babies love candy!
translation.es: A nadie le amarga un dulce. ¡A todo el mundo le encanta!

translation.en: It's nice, and you're giving people something they like that's good and nice.
translation.es: Es lindo. Le das a la gente algo bueno.

translation.en: They look at you and they see, Wow, there's a nice... There's...
translation.es: Te miran y dicen: Guau, qué amable... Es un...

translation.en: candy. The point is, I think that
translation.es: ...bombón. La cosa es que creo que...

translation.en: you should be rewarded, not punishing yourself. Okay?
And I'm... I'm prepared to reward you. I say that we go to my buddy's old restaurant downtown.
translation.es: Y yo estoy dispuesto a premiarte. Vamos al restaurante de mi amigo.

translation.en: - It's very vibey-- - We just ate on the way over here.
No, I know we just... I'm not saying for a full meal, we're just gonna eat appetizers.
translation.es: No digo una comida completa, solo un bocadito.

translation.en: I gotta go finish that interview. I'll see you at the office, Vern!
translation.es: Voy a mi entrevista. ¡Te veo en la oficina!

translation.en: I will see you at the office!
I just wanted to follow up, Mr. Rivetti.
Are you kidding me? How did you get my number?
If I could just ask one more question.
translation.es: Una pregunta más. Ya te dije todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Listen, I already told you everything I know about this crime, everything.
translation.es: Ya te dije todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Okay, you wanna know anything else,
translation.es: Regresa a los muelles y pide hablar...

translation.en: you go back down to the docks and you see my guy Stan.
translation.es: Regresa a los muelles y pide hablar... ...con Stan. Te dirá lo que quieres saber.

translation.en: He'll tell you anything else you need to know, okay?
translation.es: ...con Stan. Te dirá lo que quieres saber.

translation.en: And hey, do me a favor. Lose my number, all right?
translation.es: Y hazme un favor. Pierde mi número.

translation.en: - Good. - It's clear. Let's open it up.
Container's good. Move on to the next one.
Move it out! Get those to the trucks now!
Move out, next point! Go, go, go.
- Channel 6. - Chris.
Chris, it's April. I'm at the docks.
translation.es: Soy April. Estoy en los muelles.

translation.en: We're in the middle of the evening brief, O'Neil. - Whatever you got can wait for tomorrow. - No, no, I need a camera crew--
translation.es: Estamos preparando el noticiero. Lo tuyo tendrá que esperar.

translation.en: That one's loaded. Get it out of my way.
Damn it.
Unit two, area three, move!
I've got movement!  Keep your eyes over here!
Weapons free!
Retreat! Retreat!
Get out of here!
Taylor. Taylor!
Hey. I'm Skyping with my mom.
You have no idea what I just went through. I am freaking out. I saw a Foot Clan attack.
translation.es: No tienes idea de lo que me pasó. Vi un ataque del Clan del Pie.

translation.en: Are you okay?
I was riding my bike by the docks. It was night, it's dark already, and there are Foot Clan soldiers everywhere.
translation.es: Andaba en mi bici por el muelle. Vi a muchos soldados del Pie.

translation.en: Then out of nowhere, there was this guy fighting back against them.
translation.es: Salió un tipo a pelear con ellos.

translation.en: And he... he left behind this symbol.
translation.es: Dejó un símbolo. Yo sé que lo he visto.

translation.en: And I know that I've seen it before. I can't remember where.
translation.es: Dejó un símbolo. Yo sé que lo he visto. No recuerdo dónde. Pero hay alguien defendiéndonos...

translation.en: But there is someone fighting back against the Foot Clan.
translation.es: No recuerdo dónde. Pero hay alguien defendiéndonos... ...contra el Clan. Un justiciero. Y nadie lo sabe, excepto yo.

translation.en: There is a vigilante in this city. And no one knows, but I do.
translation.es: ...contra el Clan. Un justiciero. Y nadie lo sabe, excepto yo.

translation.en: I know. And now I have my story.
translation.es: Yo lo sé. Y tengo mi historia.

translation.en: There is no more froth and foam for me.
translation.es: Se acabaron las espumitas y la espuma para mí.

translation.en: What?
Never mind.
All right, we need a lead for tonight. Who's got it?
translation.es: Necesitamos una historia de primera plana. ¿Quién la tiene?

translation.en: Major redevelopments proposed for lower Manhattan.
No. I got something. NYPD task force taking credit for small decline in Foot- related crime.
translation.es: Fuerza especial se adjudica la baja de crímenes del Clan del Pie.

translation.en: - I like that. Let's run with that. - Yes, ma'am.
Attention, 7:00 a.m. broadcast, we have three minutes to air.
Oh, O'Neil. I'll talk to you in a minute.
No, I... I know that I'm actually overstepping my boundaries by being here,
translation.es: Yo sé que no debería estar aquí...

translation.en: but I think that you're gonna want to hear what I have to say. I actually think that you're all gonna want to hear what I have to say.
translation.es: ...pero necesita oír lo que tengo que decir. Todos necesitan oírlo.

translation.en: Um, I witnessed
an attempted Foot Clan robbery at the docks in Brooklyn last night.
translation.es: ...un intento de robo del Clan del Pie en los muelles anoche.

translation.en: Hold on, the scanner said that gunshots were heard, but there were no reports of any Foot Clan activity.
translation.es: Oímos que hubo tiros pero no reportaron actividad del Pie.

translation.en: That's because whatever they were attempting to do was stopped.
translation.es: Porque les impidieron realizar el crimen.

translation.en: What were you doing in Brooklyn anyway? Was there a trampoline convention?
- - I was in Brooklyn because I was reporting, not sitting behind my desk, McNaughton.
translation.es: Estaba reportando, no sentada en mi escritorio.

translation.en: Okay, kids!
Who stopped it?
Well, there was this guy. I didn't see him clearly, but he was swinging
translation.es: Había un tipo. No lo vi bien, pero estaba pegándoles...

translation.en: these giant shipping containers and knocking these guys into the... into the river.
translation.es: ...con unos contenedores y echando a los tipos al río.

translation.en: There is a vigilante that is fighting back against the Foot Clan. There's a huge story here!
translation.es: Hay un justiciero peleando contra el Pie. ¡Es una gran noticia!

translation.en: O'Neil, I think you found Superman. That's cool.
The vigilante is real. I saw him.
translation.es: El justiciero es real. Yo lo vi.

translation.en: O'Neil, I'm gonna assume that you would not come up here and tell us
translation.es: O'Neil, supongo que no viniste a compartir...

translation.en: this fantastic story without some tangible proof.
I took this photo on one of the shipping containers.
translation.es: Saqué esta foto de uno de los contenedores.

translation.en: I actually think that it may be his calling card.
translation.es: Creo que es su tarjeta de presentación.

translation.en: This is nothing, O'Neil. This is nothing!
translation.es: Eso no es nada. No es nada.

translation.en: That's exactly the point.
Somebody stopped a Foot robbery and left no evidence. There is nothing.
translation.es: ...paró un robo del Pie y no dejó evidencia. No hay nada.

translation.en: Oh, I get it.
You wanted me to put nothing - on the nightly news. - Of course not.
translation.es: ¿Quieres que ponga nada en el noticiero?

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna pretend we never had this conversation. I'm erasing it from my mind.
translation.es: Voy a fingir que no tuvimos esta charla. La voy a borrar.

translation.en: And the rest of us, we're gonna go back to work. Let's hit it!  Okay, we're ready with the Casper story.
translation.es: Los demás vamos a volver a trabajar.

translation.en: Hello, everybody. Welcome to the Channel 6 Morning News.
New developments in that ongoing sanitation strike to tell you about.
translation.es: Nuevos acontecimientos en la huelga de Sanidad.

translation.en: But first, after reviewing the city's soaring crime rates with the police commissioner,
translation.es: Después de revisar el nivel de crímenes con el jefe de la policía...

translation.en: Councilman Dan Gregor took to the steps of City Hall,
translation.es: ...el concejal Dan Gregor hizo estas declaraciones...

translation.en: reaffirming the city's commitment to fight against the rising crime organization
translation.es: ...reafirmando el compromiso de la ciudad de combatir...

translation.en: calling themselves the Foot Clan.
translation.es: ...al Clan del Pie. Lo hizo tras firmar un nuevo...

translation.en: He did so on the heels of a renewed contract
translation.es: ...al Clan del Pie. Lo hizo tras firmar un nuevo... ...contrato con Eric Sacks e Industrias Sacks.

translation.en: with Eric Sacks and Sacks Industries.
translation.es: ...contrato con Eric Sacks e Industrias Sacks.

translation.en: Using the Sacks research and securities technology,
translation.es: Con la tecnología de investigación y seguridad Sacks...

translation.en: this city greatly improves its chances of bringing the Foot Clan to justice!
translation.es: ...la ciudad mejora la posibilidad de traer al Clan ante la justicia.

translation.en: Begin!
Your men are weak.
It's no surprise your missions fail.
translation.es: No me sorprende que fracases en tus misiones.

translation.en: We couldn't have anticipated the vigilante showing up at the docks, Master Shredder.
translation.es: No pudimos anticipar que el justiciero apareciera allí.

translation.en: You have been trained for such contingencies.
translation.es: Has sido entrenado para esas contingencias.

translation.en: But we've never seen an enemy like this.
translation.es: Nunca hemos visto un enemigo así.

translation.en: Their size.
Their strength.
They're not human.
I don't believe in fairy tales.
translation.es: No creo en los cuentos de hadas.

translation.en: It's what society wants to reduce the Foot Clan to,
translation.es: La sociedad quiere reducir al Clan del Pie a eso.

translation.en: a myth.
But the Foot Clan
will rise again.
Capture the vigilantes however you can.
translation.es: Captura a los justicieros como puedas.

translation.en: Use innocent people as bait.
translation.es: Usa a gente inocente como carnada.

translation.en: No one will stop us in our quest
to reclaim victory.
We will own this city.
Ladies and gentlemen, please join me in welcoming the NYPD's top benefactor,
translation.es: Por favor, saluden al donador No. 1 de la policía de Nueva York...

translation.en: Eric Sacks.
Please, please. Please.
Sit down, sit down.
I have to say,
it's wonderful to see so many people out here tonight,
translation.es: ...que es maravilloso ver a tanta gente, sobre todo en un barrio...

translation.en: especially in a neighborhood so hard hit by the Foot's crime wave.
translation.es: ...que es maravilloso ver a tanta gente, sobre todo en un barrio... ...tan golpeado por los crímenes del Pie.

translation.en: Years ago, my life was touched by tragedy.
translation.es: Hace años, una tragedia tocó mi vida.

translation.en: I was a young scientist working with a world- class team
translation.es: Yo era un joven trabajando con un equipo excelente...

translation.en: on cutting- edge research.
And our laboratory was attacked,
set fire to, robbed by the cowards that call themselves the Foot Clan.
translation.es: ...incendiado, robado, por los cobardes del Clan del Pie.

translation.en: Several of my employees...
lost their lives that day.
And it is in their honor, in their memory,
translation.es: Y es en su honor, en su memoria...

translation.en: that Sacks Industries, whether through Sacks Biomed, Sacks Robotics, or Sacks Construction,
translation.es: ...que Industrias Sacks, a través de Sacks Biomed, Sacks Robótica...

translation.en: will remain committed to keeping the city of New York, our city,
translation.es: ...seguirá comprometida a mantener nuestra ciudad de Nueva York...

translation.en: safe.
So whenever someone takes flame to this city,
translation.es: Cuando alguien provoque un incendio en esta ciudad...

translation.en: I will be there to put the fire out.
And that's a promise.
Thank you. Thank you.
Mr. Sacks. April O'Neil. You worked with my father.
translation.es: Sr. Sacks. Soy April O'Neil. Usted trabajó con mi padre.

translation.en: I can't believe it. I haven't seen you since...
translation.es: No lo puedo creer. No te había visto desde...

translation.en: Since his funeral.
It was a long time ago.
I just wanted to tell you that your words really resonated with me, and I hope to one day
translation.es: Quiero decirle que sus palabras me conmovieron. Espero algún día...

translation.en: contribute to the city in the way that you do.
Well, it looks like you're doing a pretty good job. Channel 6, very impressive, April.
translation.es: Parece que vas muy bien. Canal 6. Es impresionante.

translation.en: Um... Thank you. It's, uh...
It isn't exactly everything I anticipated it would be.
translation.es: No es exactamente lo que esperaba que fuera.

translation.en: As long as you are true to yourself, your father will always be proud of you.
translation.es: Mientras seas leal a ti misma, tu padre estará orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: Mr. Sacks, we have to be uptown at 7:00.
translation.es: Tenemos que estar en el centro a las 7:00.

translation.en: I'll see you on TV.
Eric Sacks was so inspiring.
I know this is a story that actually matters.
The superhero one? That's a good idea. I should chase that down.
Where's everybody going?
- - O'Neil! Where are you going?
- Hey, hey. - April!  What are you running from? Wait, wait, wait!
Shots fired, Broadway and Center Street.
translation.es: Disparos en Broadway y calle Centre.

translation.es: Hay actividad del Pie en la estación de Broad.

translation.en: They're taking hostages, dude.

translation.en: But you know we're not supposed to go above ground.
translation.es: No debemos subir a la calle.

translation.en: We've done this before. We started something, we gotta finish it.
translation.es: Ya lo hemos hecho. Si empezamos algo, lo terminamos.

translation.en: This is insane. That cat is playing Chopsticks with chopsticks!

translation.en: - Don't be an idiot. -
Let's rock 'n' roll, boys!
Go, go!
If you want to live, do it! Go on!
Just stay down!
Get over here!
Keep moving!
Move to the side.
- They're bombs. - Shut up!
On the ground!
Nobody move!
We know you're out there!
If you don't surrender, we start executing hostages!
translation.es: ¡Si no te rindes, empezaremos a ejecutar rehenes! ¡Agacha la cabeza! ¡No te muevas!

translation.en: Get your head down! Don't move!
Don't make me tell you again! Not a word!
Don't look at me!
Don't do it!
You!
Stand up!
All aboard!
Let's go! Let's move! Move!
- They went up that way! - Did you see that?  Here, here. They climbed up here!
- Right here. - Some kind of freak!
There were a couple of them! Whew! Right past me!  They saved us.
Let's go, guys! Both sides!
- Yeah, boys, bring it in. -
That was amazing. You were incredible!
Great elbow, Donnie.
Ooh, that's what I'm talking about. This is our city! These are our streets!
You mess with us, you step into the Wu- whoo- Tang!

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Did you see that guy's jaw connect with the concrete?

translation.en: He'll be drinking out of a sippy cup for months!
Ah, that's what I'm talking about, brothers. Like shadows in the night. Completely unseen.
translation.es: Así se hace. Como sombra en la noche, sin que nadie nos vea.

translation.en: What was that?  It's a camera flash.
translation.es: -¿Qué fue eso? -El flash de una cámara.

translation.en: We know it's a camera flash.  Who's behind the camera flash?
translation.es: -Ya lo sabemos. -¿Quién está detrás del flash?

translation.en: By my calculations, it's a girl.
- Now we got to kill her... - What?
With kindness! Give her some flowers, earn her trust.
- I got this. - Raph, no, no, no! Come on!
Give me the camera.
Ooh, look, he's doing his Batman voice.

translation.en: Oh, she's so hot, I can feel my shell tightening.
translation.es: Es tan guapa, me aprieta el caparazón.

translation.en: We can hear you!
If you don't give me the camera,
translation.es: Si no me das la cámara, voy a...

translation.en: - I'm gonna... - Enough!
Back off, Raph.
I only saw Batman once!
Ma'am, hello. I apologize.
My colleague here forgot to say please.

translation.en: So,
would you please hand over the camera?
Whoa. Chill. It's just a mask. See? Don't freak out.
translation.es: Cálmate. Es una máscara. ¿Ves? No te espantes.

translation.en: Right?
Oh, I think that went well.
Blood pressure stabilizing.
Why are we still here playing doctor?
She may have a head injury.
translation.es: -¿Por qué seguimos aquí? -Puede estar lesionada. Corrección. Es una chica sexy que puede estar lesionada, por lo cual...

translation.en: Uh, correction. She's a hot chick who may have a head injury, which makes it our civic duty to...
translation.es: Corrección. Es una chica sexy que puede estar lesionada, por lo cual...

translation.es: Señorita, ¿me oye? ¿Sabe en qué ciudad está?

translation.en: Have you seen that video where the cat plays Chopsticks with the chopsticks?
translation.es: ¿Has visto el video del gato tocando palitos chinos?

translation.en: Can we focus here?
Guys, please! Come on. Give her some air.
What are you?
Well, miss,
uh, we're ninjas. We're mutants.
Well, technically, we're turtles.
Oh, and we're teenagers. But we can still have adult conversations.
translation.es: Y somos adolescentes. Pero podemos conversar como adultos.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. So...
You're...
ninja, mutant,
turtle, teenagers?
Well, when you put it like that, it sounds ridiculous!
translation.es: Si lo dice así, suena ridículo.

translation.en: See, she's looking at us like we're freaks. I bet that's why you took our picture, wasn't it?
translation.es: Nos mira como a unos fenómenos. ¿Por eso nos tomaste la foto?

translation.en: To show your friends?
Bro, that's a good thing! Maybe she has hot friends.
translation.es: ¡Eso es bueno! Quizá tenga amigas sexys.

No, no, no, no, no. Please.
How many times do I have to tell you? We don't break things, we fix them.
translation.es: Te lo vuelvo a repetir. Nosotros no rompemos cosas, las arreglamos.

translation.en: Donnie already wiped the phone, genius. Problem solved, moving on.
