translation.es: -¿Quién te puso a cargo? -Tú sabes quién.

translation.en: Ooh, tension! It's been, like, 30 whole minutes since you guys had this argument.
translation.es: ¡Tensión! Hace 30 minutos que no discuten sobre eso.

translation.en: Leonardo, if we want to make it home before Master, we gotta hustle.
translation.es: Tenemos que llegar a casa antes que el maestro.

translation.en: Leonardo?
Do not say a word about this to anyone.
translation.es: No le digas nada de esto a nadie.

translation.en: If you do, we will find you.
April O'Neil.
We're on the move, Raphael.
Raphael?
Yeah!
We'll find you, O'Neil.
I'm sorry, that came across super creepy, okay?
We will find you, though.
I was on fire, bro!
Did you see me back there?
Guys, I totally talked to a girl!  Shut up, Mikey!
Yeah, bro!
- - Mikey, was that you?
Pepperoni.
Leonardo. I know those names. I know those names.
Raphael, Raphael. Leonardo.
Good evening. This is April O'Neil, reporting live from my daddy's lab.
translation.es: Soy April O'Neil, reportando del laboratorio de mi papá.

translation.en: I know it sounds pretty boring, but actually, he does some pretty cool stuff.
translation.es: Sé que suena aburrido, pero mi papá hace cosas geniales.

translation.en: Time to put the camera away, April.
Aw, Dad!
And now, I will show you
something amazing. It's supposed to be from a different planet
translation.es: ...algo increíble. Se supone que es de otro planeta...

translation.en: - in outer space! - Here we go.
Mr. Sacks, what sort of experiments are you doing here?
That's a very complicated question.
We're trying to change the world.
Look at the camera!
Hello, Splinter.
And these are my little turtles,
translation.es: Y estas son mis tortuguitas: Leonardo...

translation.en: Leonardo, Raphael,
translation.es: Y estas son mis tortuguitas: Leonardo... ...Rafael...

translation.en: Michelangelo, and Donatello.
The fans want to see you!
I knew it.
The vigilante, I saw him. I saw them! I saw them.
translation.es: El justiciero. Yo lo vi. ¡Yo los vi!

translation.en: I've known them since I was a little girl. They were my pets.
translation.es: Los conozco desde que era niña.

translation.en: They were my childhood pets, and they were named after Italian Renaissance painters.
translation.es: Eran mis mascotas y les puse nombres de pintores renacentistas.

translation.en: Mom, I wanna move back home.
translation.es: Mamá, quiero mudarme de regreso a la casa.

translation.en: Is he here? I don't see him.
Donnie?
My thermal scans indicate there's a 74% variable that there's a 61% chance he's not--
translation.es: Mis escaneos indican una variable del 74% del 61% de probabilidades...

translation.en: That he's not here, guys. That he's not here.
Fall in quietly.
Dude.
So, guys, if it wasn't already obvious with that girl,
translation.es: Muchachos, por si no fue obvio al verme con esa chica...

translation.en: - dibs. -
If Master Splinter catches us, he'll send us back to the Ha'shi.
translation.es: Si el maestro nos descubre, nos mandará otra vez al Ja'shi.

translation.en: I ain't going back to the Ha'shi.
Every time we're in the Ha'shi, it's because of you.
translation.es: Siempre que acabamos ahí, es por ti.

translation.en: Well, bro, you won't have to worry about me dragging you down anymore.
translation.es: Ya no tendrán que preocuparse de que los castiguen por mí.

translation.en: What's that supposed to mean?
I'm going out on my own. First chance I get.
translation.es: Me voy a independizar. Cuando pueda.

translation.en: How are we gonna finish our hip- hop Christmas album, bro? - You're the hype man! -
translation.es: ¿Y nuestro álbum de hip-hop de Navidad? ¡Tú eres el presentador!

translation.en: - Shut up. -
Shut up.
You spit in my eye.
Shh! He's not going anywhere. We all stick together.
translation.es: No se va a ir. Nos mantenemos unidos.

translation.en: Sorry I spit in your eye, bro.
- Shut up. - Guys? Guys.
We got a bogey.
- - Where have you been?
We weren't...
I forgot to soak my retainer.
I'm totally sleepwalking! Look, Mikey's sleeping and walking.
He's totally innocent.
Enough! You disobeyed a direct order. Why did you go above ground? What happened?
translation.es: ¡Basta! ¡Desobedecieron una orden! ¿Por qué salieron a la superficie?

translation.en: - Very well. -
If that's how it's going to be,
- to the Ha'shi! -
O'Neil! All right, what was so important I had to get here?
- Okay. Are you ready? - Yeah.
Okay.  You know how
- I saw the vigilante? - Yeah.
translation.es: Sabe que vi al justiciero. No tenía fotos ni evidencia y le pareció una locura.

translation.en: But I had no photos or evidence to show you, so I just sounded crazy.
translation.es: No tenía fotos ni evidencia y le pareció una locura.

translation.en: - Yes. - Okay. But I saw him again. Well, I didn't see him again, I saw them, because there's four.
translation.es: Lo volví a ver. Y no es lo sino los porque son cuatro.

translation.en: There's not just one, there's four. And I was standing as close to them as you are to me right now.
translation.es: Y estuve tan cerca de ellos como usted de mí.

translation.en: What'd they look like?
I'll show you.
Like this.
Well, they don't look like turtles because they are turtles.
translation.es: No son como tortugas porque son tortugas.

translation.en: They're over six feet tall and they speak English.
translation.es: Miden más de 1,80 m de altura y hablan inglés.

translation.en: - - Oh, my God.
I was awake all night, please look, I was awake all night
translation.es: Anoche no dormí nada. Por favor, mire.

translation.en: googling all of the thwarted crimes over the past three months, and this symbol
translation.es: Busqué crímenes frustrados en los últimos 3 meses. Este símbolo...

translation.en: appeared at every single one. Look. Every single one of them.
translation.es: ...apareció en todos, en todos los lugares.

translation.en: This one, look. Here, here, here, here, here.
And it's an ancient Japanese symbol that means family.
- Oh, my God... - Wait, it's on my laptop.
I can't believe you brought me in to do this!
translation.es: ¡No puedo creer que me llamaste para esto!

translation.en: Here. It's... It's here, it's here.
- - This is my father's lab.
translation.es: Este es el laboratorio de mi padre. El mismo...

translation.en: This is the same lab where these things were born,
translation.es: Este es el laboratorio de mi padre. El mismo... ...donde crecieron estas cosas o nacieron o mutaron.

translation.en: or... or... or created, or mutated, or...
translation.es: ...donde crecieron estas cosas o nacieron o mutaron.

translation.en: I don't know the terminology, but will you please just look at what I'm showing you and listen to me? It's all connected.
translation.es: No sé la terminología. Solo mire y escúcheme.

translation.en: The turtles are the vigilantes, and the vigilantes are these turtles.
translation.es: Las tortugas son los justicieros y los justicieros son estas tortugas.

translation.en: Pizza has cheese, tomato sauce, all your favorite stuff.
translation.es: La pizza tiene queso, salsa de tomate, sus cosas favoritas.

translation.en: Eat it. You guys need nutrition. Or not.
translation.es: Cómansela. Necesitan nutrición...o no. A ver si entendí. ¿Me estás diciendo que hay...

translation.en: I just want to be clear. You are now telling me that there are
translation.es: A ver si entendí. ¿Me estás diciendo que hay...

translation.en: four six- foot talking turtles walking around New York City,
translation.es: ...cuatro tortugas de 1,80 m caminando por Nueva York...

translation.en: and no one has seen them but you?
That's what I'm telling you.
I don't mean to laugh, but is there anything else we should know about them?
translation.es: Perdón por reírme, ¿pero necesito saber algo más?

translation.en: They're ninjas.
I'm sorry, what?
And they do karate.
Okay, get out.
O'Neil!
It could have been worse.
I just got fired, Vern. How could it be worse?
Maybe it's good. Maybe you should take a little time, take care of yourself.
translation.es: Quizá sea bueno. Tomas un poco de tiempo, te cuidas.

translation.en: Come on, let me give you a ride.
Not unless you're going to the Eric Sacks' estate. - April... Hey. - I'm not giving up on this story.
translation.es: Solo si vas a casa de Eric Sacks. No voy a abandonar esta historia.

translation.en: You gotta put that to bed.
Would all of those other great reporters that you worked with, would they have put it to bed?
translation.es: ¿Los grandes reporteros que conociste lo hubieran olvidado?

translation.en: No. That's different. How is it different?
They all started exactly where I am, right?
I'm not driving the Channel 6 news van onto the Sacks estate.
translation.es: No entraré ahí con la camioneta del noticiero.

translation.en: - Who asked you to do that? - Uh, you did. And a thanks would have been nice.
translation.es: -¿Quién te pidió que lo hicieras? -Tú. Y gracias hubiera estado bien.

translation.en: Maybe one day you're gonna be thanking me.
translation.es: Quizá un día me des las gracias a mí.

translation.en: So, what do you want with Eric Sacks?
My dad used to work for him.
He's the only person that's gonna be able to tell me whether or not I'm crazy.
translation.es: Solo él me puede decir si estoy loca.

translation.en: Crazy about what?
I don't need you to laugh at me, also. Oh, come on, O'Neil.
translation.es: -No necesito que te burles de mí. -Anda.

translation.en: This is the Fenwick Express.
translation.es: Este es el Expreso Fenwick, una...

translation.en: It's a judgment- free zone, a cocoon of safety.
translation.es: ...zona libre de juicio, un capullo de seguridad.

translation.en: Promise?
I'm insulted that you would suggest otherwise.
translation.es: Me ofende que creas que no es así.

translation.en: Ooh, 11 hours in the Ha'shi.
Are you sure none of you want to tell me
translation.es: ¿Están seguros de que no me quieren decir...

translation.en: where you were last night?
How you holding up, fellas?
Ah! I ain't breaking if Donnie ain't breaking.
translation.es: No me voy a doblegar si Doni no se doblega.

translation.en: Experiencing intense nausea but not breaking.
translation.es: Tengo muchas náuseas pero no hablaré.

translation.en: Guys? I'm in the zone!
There is literally nothing that could break me right now!
translation.es: No hay nada que me pueda doblegar.

translation.en: Starting to break.
Of course, you've all tasted the five- cheese pizza.
translation.es: Ustedes han probado la pizza de 5 quesos.

translation.en: But this,
cheese- mongers have speculated of its existence for centuries.
translation.es: Los vendedores de queso han especulado sobre su existencia.

translation.en: Da Vinci's original masterpiece.
translation.es: La obra maestra original de Da Vinci.

translation.en: I submit to you...
...the 99- cheese pizza.
It's not possible.
Mikey, it's a trap! A pizza with that variety of cheese is a culinary impossibility!
translation.es: ¡Maiki, es una trampa! ¡Esa pizza es culinariamente imposible!

translation.en: - Shall I list the ingredients? - No.
- Cheddar. -
- Provolone. - Mikey, don't you do it!
- Asiago. - Keep it together!
Taleggio.
I don't even know what that is.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé qué es eso.

translation.en: Mozzarella, of course.
All right, all right, all right! We left the lair because the Foot were taking hostages
translation.es: ¡Está bien! ¡Dejamos la guarida porque el Pie tomaba rehenes!

translation.en: and we kicked some serious butt, and there was this girl named April O'Neil who took our picture,  but we took care of it.
translation.es: Los golpeamos y April O'Neil nos sacó una foto pero la borramos.

translation.en: Idiot.
Oh, no, my worst fears have been realized.
translation.es: No, mis peores miedos se han realizado.

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Donnie erased the picture. We're not in danger.
translation.es: ¡Doni borró la foto! No corremos ningún peligro.

translation.en: No. It's April O'Neil who is in danger!
translation.es: No. April O'Neil es quien corre peligro.

translation.en: Find the girl. Bring her here.
translation.es: Busquen a la chica. Tráiganla aquí.

translation.en: But, sensei, you said to not go...
Find the girl.
That's what I told Thompson, and she fired me.
translation.es: Eso le dije a Thompson y me despidió.

translation.en: So they're aliens?
No, that's stupid.
They're reptiles.
They help people, I guess.
translation.es: Le ayudan a la gente, supongo.

translation.en: Heroes in the half- shell.
- Okay. - Come on. It's not that crazy.
translation.es: Está bien. No es una locura tan grande. El reino animal está lleno de...

translation.en: I... The animal kingdom is full of...
translation.es: No es una locura tan grande. El reino animal está lleno de...

translation.en: I used to have a dog that could moonwalk.
translation.es: Yo tenía un perro que bailaba.

translation.en: Thanks for the ride, Vern. Yeah. No problem.
- - Nothing better than dropping off a pretty girl at a rich guy's house.
translation.es: Nada mejor que traer una chica bonita a casa de un rico.

translation.en: Hi, it's April O'Neil, here to see Eric Sacks.
translation.es: Soy April O'Neil. Vine a ver a Eric Sacks.

translation.en: April's arrived early this year.
I'm sorry to barge in on you like this, Mr. Sacks.
No, no, no. Please, please. Thank you.
I've been working on a story.
And I have this theory that there are these vigilantes that are fighting back against the Foot.
translation.es: Creo que hay justicieros peleando contra el Pie.

translation.en: I think that you and my father may have created them.
translation.es: Creo que Ud. y mi padre quizá los crearon.

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure I...
Can you please tell me everything that you know about Project Renaissance?
translation.es: Dígame lo que sabe sobre el Proyecto Renacimiento.

translation.en: Well, um, it was a dream.
A dream that died with your father.
What if it isn't dead?
That's impossible.
We lost all our research in the fire, all our specimens, everything.
translation.es: Perdimos toda la investigación en el incendio, los especímenes, todo.

translation.en: I've spent the last 15 years trying to replicate the results.
translation.es: He pasado 15 años tratando de reproducir los resultados.

translation.en: You didn't lose everything in the fire.
translation.es: No perdió todo en el incendio.

translation.en: This can't be real. It is real.
I saw all four of them.
Do you really want to know about Project Renaissance?
translation.es: ¿Quieres saber más sobre el Proyecto Renacimiento?

translation.en: - Yes. - Come with me.
I was born in Japan, at a military base in Okinawa.
translation.es: Nací en Japón, en una base militar en Okinawa.

translation.en: My father went to Vietnam.
Didn't come back.
I was an outsider in a foreign land.
translation.es: Yo era un extranjero en una tierra ajena.

translation.en: A freak.
I was a powerless and helpless boy,
translation.es: Era un niño impotente e indefenso.

translation.en: until a local sensei took me under his wing,
translation.es: Hasta que me acogió un sensei local.

translation.en: and he saved me. Taught me lessons that I later shared with your father.
translation.es: Él me salvó. Me enseñó cosas que compartí con tu padre.

translation.en: 9th century Japan.
An evil warlord ruled the land.
He poisoned the water supply, bringing on the dark ages.
translation.es: Envenenó las reservas de agua, ocasionando una edad oscura.

translation.en: Death, and disease, and suffering ran rampant.
translation.es: Se desataron las enfermedades y el sufrimiento.

translation.en: Not unlike the Foot Clan and what they'd like to do to our city.
translation.es: Algo así como lo que el Clan del Pie le quiere hacer a la ciudad.

translation.en: Then one day, a hero arose.
A great alchemist discovered the antidote
translation.es: Un gran alquimista. Descubrió el antídoto...

translation.en: to the warlord's poison.
The cure- all
for his evil.
Your father and I were trying to recreate that cure- all.
translation.es: Tu padre y yo tratamos de recrear esa cura.

translation.en: We developed a mutagen capable of stimulating self- repair
translation.es: Desarrollamos un mutágeno capaz de estimular la autoreparación...

translation.en: on a cellular level.
What were you going to do with it?
Imagine New York City...
being victim to a chemical attack.
This mutagen would be able to reverse its effects.
translation.es: Este mutágeno podría contrarrestar los efectos.

translation.en: It would save the city, it would save the people.
translation.es: Salvaría la ciudad, a la gente.

translation.en: Those test subjects, those turtles, running in their blood
translation.es: Los sujetos del experimento, las tortugas, tienen en la sangre...

translation.en: is the last of this precious mutagen.
translation.es: ...lo último que quedaba de ese valioso mutágeno.

translation.en: And up until a few moments ago,
I thought we failed.
I thought they died in the fire. How...
translation.es: Creía que habían muerto en el incendio. ¿Cómo?

translation.en: How could they have lived?
Because I saved them.
Of course you did.
April, the mutagen possesses powers
translation.es: April, el mutágeno posee poderes que van más allá...

translation.en: beyond our wildest hopes.
Whatever resources you need,
I'm here.
Let's work together. We'll find them.
The course of human history may depend on it.
translation.es: El curso de la historia podría depender de esto.

translation.en: I'll show you out.
Bam! You've been hacked!
By Donatello. Remember me? Turtle. Four eyes. But enough about me.
We told you we'd find you. Meet us here. And come alone. Or... Or else, we're...
translation.es: Te dijimos que te encontraríamos. Alcánzanos aquí. Y ven sola.

translation.en: You shall be punished... and stuff.
Hello?
You told me to come here.
I didn't bring anyone with me.
translation.es: No traje a nadie. Hice lo que...

translation.en: Okay! Are you April O'Neil?
Initiating retinal scan. Scanning, scanning, scanning, scanning.
Scan complete. It's her. It's her. Guys, it's her!
Of course it's her, Donnie.
Hey! Really glad you could make it.
translation.es: Me da gusto que hayas venido.

translation.en: Hey. There's someone important we want to introduce you to, but first...
translation.es: Queremos presentarte a alguien importante, pero antes...

translation.en: Aw, yeah, welcome to my crib, girl.
translation.es: Sí, bienvenida a mi guarida, nena.

translation.en: Where are we?
Hey, it's our Fortress of Solitude.
- Our Hogwarts. - Our Xavier Academy.
translation.es: Nuestra Academia Xavier. ¡Nuestro Domo Maravilla último modelo!

translation.en: Our next generation, state- of- the- art WonderDome!
Ugh. Are we in the sewer?
No.
- Technically, yes. - Yeah.
Yeah, it's a sewer.
You brought us here, April.
Splinter?
How does she know his name? Did you tell her his name?
- Maybe she's clairvoyant. - Maybe she's a Jedi!
Come closer.
It's been a long time.
You always did have your father's eyes.
translation.es: Siempre tuviste los ojos de tu padre.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Don't be afraid. All will be made clear.
This is crazy.
Why are you here?
Student.
There's been a miracle.
The vigilantes who've been causing us so much trouble?
translation.es: ¿Los justicieros que nos han causado tantos problemas?

translation.en: They're the test subjects.
Those itty- bitty box turtles that we thought we lost in the fire?
translation.es: ¿Las tortuguitas que creíamos haber perdido en el incendio?

translation.en: They're alive, Master Shredder.
And they've grown into something
translation.es: Y se han convertido en algo...

translation.en: powerful.
It won't be easy to capture them, but if we can,
translation.es: No será fácil capturarlas, pero si podemos...

translation.en: we can finally carry out the plan that we had all those years ago.
translation.es: ...podremos realizar el plan que teníamos hace años.

translation.en: My Foot Clan will have unlimited power. And you will have your money.
translation.es: Mi Clan del Pie tendrá poder ilimitado. Y tú tendrás tu dinero.

translation.en: The city will be ours.
Find them.
O'Neil's daughter was the one who found them,
translation.es: La hija de O'Neil las encontró.

translation.en: and she will be the one who will take us right to them.
translation.es: Ella nos llevará directo a ellas.

translation.en: There's the ping. We've breached the cloaking security.
translation.es: Ya está. Penetramos la red de camuflaje.

translation.en: Listen closely, April.
I don't remember a time before living in that laboratory.
translation.es: No recuerdo nada antes de vivir en ese laboratorio.

translation.en: That fateful night started like any other.
translation.es: Esa noche fatídica empezó como cualquier otra.

translation.en: Sacks gave us our injections.
Your father made sure our vital signs were strong.
translation.es: Tu padre revisó nuestros signos vitales.

translation.en: And you, as always,
provided us with a special treat.
After the brothers went to sleep, I heard loud voices.
translation.es: Después de que los hermanos se durmieron, oí voces gritando.

translation.en: There was the smell of smoke.
Alarms sounded.
Your father had discovered the truth behind the man he was working for.
translation.es: Tu padre había descubierto la verdad sobre su superior.

translation.en: He set fire to the lab.
His last breath was taken trying to destroy Shredder's plan.
translation.es: Tomó su último respiro intentando destruir el plan de Destructor.

translation.en: I was terrified.
But then, you appeared...
And ushered us to safety.
translation.es: Y nos llevaste a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: I never had a voice then,
but I thank you now, April.
translation.es: ...pero ahora te doy las gracias, April.

translation.en: We wandered the sewers until I found this place.
translation.es: Recorrimos las alcantarillas hasta dar con este lugar.

translation.en: It was then that the mutagen that was injected into our blood
translation.es: Fue entonces que el mutágeno que teníamos en la sangre...

translation.en: began to change us in miraculous ways.
I saw how your father loved you,
translation.es: Yo vi cómo te quería tu padre...

translation.en: and I knew I had to show that same love to the turtles.
translation.es: ...y supe que tenía que querer así a las tortugas. Me convertí en su padre...

translation.en: I became their father,
and they became my sons.
translation.es: ...y ellos se convirtieron en mis hijos.

translation.en: Like all children, they were drawn to the distractions of popular culture.
translation.es: Como a todos los niños, les atraía la cultura popular.

translation.en: And I knew one day they would want to explore the world above.
translation.es: Yo sabía que un día querrían explorar el mundo.

translation.en: They would be ridiculed.
They would need to learn to protect themselves, both mentally and physically.
translation.es: Tendrían que aprender a protegerse, mental y físicamente.

translation.en: Hey, does anyone want to play Buck- Buck?
translation.es: ¿Alguien quiere jugar cubetas? ¿Jugamos a salta el burro?

translation.en: Buck one!
Buck two!
Buck three! Where you going, Raph?
Come on. I can't do it by myself. I need all four!
translation.es: -¡Solo no! ¡Necesito a los cuatro! -¡Te falta uno!

translation.en: You're a Buck short.
translation.es: -¡Solo no! ¡Necesito a los cuatro! -¡Te falta uno! ¡Eso suena estúpido! ¡Como tú, Maiki!

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds stupid. Like you, Mikey!
That's why you're just the hype man, brah.
- See these moves? - Yeah, whatever, man.
translation.es: -¿Ves estas movidas? -Lo que tú digas. Arte del ninjutsu por Eastman & Laird

translation.en: And then I found a way.
First, I would teach myself the ancient art of Ninjutsu.
translation.es: Primero aprendería el antiguo arte del ninjutsu.

translation.en: The brothers followed my lead,
accelerating at a wondrous rate!
Wassup, brah? Want some of this?
I'm like a ghost! I'm over here, now I'm over here, brah. Like a shadow!
translation.es: ¡Soy como un fantasma! ¡Estoy aquí, estoy acá! ¡Como una sombra!

translation.en: I'm a flame shadow fire dragon!
Their gift was also their passion.
translation.es: Su don también era su pasión.

translation.en: They lived, breathed, and dreamed all things martial arts.
translation.es: Vivían, respiraban y soñaban con las artes marciales.

translation.en: Then, they were ready.
The Katana, most noble of all the blades.
translation.es: La katana, la más noble de las espadas.

translation.en: It is the weapon of a leader.
translation.es: Es el arma de un líder.

translation.en: Everything they are,
and everything that they've become
translation.es: ...y todo en lo que se han convertido...

translation.en: was made possible by the bravery
that you displayed on that fateful night.
Dude.
I was just a little girl.
And you gave us freedom,
where others would have kept us in cages.
translation.es: ...cuando otros nos hubieran metido en jaulas.

translation.en: Wait a minute, Dad. All these years, you told us we were rescued from the fire
translation.es: Un momento. Siempre nos has dicho que nos rescató del fuego...

translation.en: by a great guardian spirit, the Hogo- sha.
That's right.
And this is the Hogo- sha.
What?
My girlfriend's totally the Hogo- sha.
Fortunately, our engineers have been making great progress
in refining the robotics in your armor.
We're taking it to the next level, bridging the gap between ancient tradition
translation.es: Es el siguiente nivel. Superará la brecha entre la tradición...

translation.en: and modern warfare.
Tonight, I dine on turtle soup.
translation.es: Esta noche cenaré sopa de tortuga.

translation.en: Why did you bring me here?
To find out who you told of our existence.
translation.es: Para saber a quién le dijiste que existíamos.

translation.en: Nobody that believed me, except for Eric Sacks.
translation.es: A nadie que me creyera, excepto Eric Sacks.

translation.en: Sacks.
Just as I feared.
Sacks is not a friend.
His soul has been poisoned by the influence of a dark master...
translation.es: Su alma ha sido envenenada por la influencia de un maestro tenebroso.

translation.en: The Shredder.
Shredder practically raised Sacks in Japan.
translation.es: Destructor prácticamente crió a Sacks en Japón. Es como un padre para él. Sacks haría lo que fuera por su maestro.

translation.en: He's like a father to him. Sacks will do anything for his master.
translation.es: Es como un padre para él. Sacks haría lo que fuera por su maestro.

translation.en: Wait, wait.
Sacks and Shredder? So, why aren't we out there hunting them down?
translation.es: ¿Sacks y Destructor? ¿Por qué no los estamos persiguiendo?

translation.en: Because, Raphael,
the Shredder is a skilled warrior whose cruelty is ever- reaching!
translation.es: ...El Destructor es un guerrero cuya crueldad es legendaria.

translation.en: And you are just teenagers.
The mutagen in your blood is of great value to them.
translation.es: El mutágeno en su sangre tiene un gran valor para ellos.

translation.en: Now that Sacks has confirmation that you are alive,
translation.es: Y ahora que Sacks ha confirmado que ustedes están vivos...

translation.en: I fear they will bring the fight to us.
translation.es: ...me temo que traerán la lucha acá.

translation.en: Oh, no.
Stand by to make entry. Let's move!
Go, go, go!
Perimeter infringe... Breach! We have incoming!
Oh, no! Oh, no! We got two breaches. Fan room, weapons wall!
translation.es: ¡Tenemos dos brechas, cuarto de ventiladores y muro de armas!

translation.en: Mikey, flank right! Donnie, on me!
We gotta go! Go, go!
translation.es: ¡Maiki, flanco derecho! ¡Doni, sígueme! ¡Rápido! Prepárense para colocar carga.

translation.en: Stand by to set charge.
Lock and load. We're going on 10.
No live ammo. Tranqs only.
Take 'em alive!
No! Get back!
Donnie!
Engage!
Get him!
There they are! Neutralize them!
They've got tranq darts!
Well, don't let them hit your skin. Let's go! Let's move!
translation.es: -No dejes que toquen tu piel. -¡Vamos, rápido!

translation.en: Tango at 12! Wassup, brah? Oh, you think you can handle this, huh?
I'm a snapping turtle, fool. Snap, snap, snap!
translation.es: ¡Soy una tortuga que muerde! ¡Ñac, ñac, ñac!

translation.en: I meant to do that! I meant to do it!
We got a breach in the fan room! Raph, get to the fan room!
Why are you always telling me what to do?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre me dices qué hacer?

translation.en: Just go! Mikey, you gotta get April out of here, now!
translation.es: ¡Corre! ¡Maiki, tienes que sacar a April de aquí! ¡Yo me encargo!

translation.en: I got this!
April, come with me. I got a safe place for you to hide.
And if you get thirsty, I got a secret stash of Orange Crush behind the fridge.
translation.es: Y si te da sed, tengo una reserva de sodas atrás del refrigerador.

translation.en: Don't tell Raph.
Shredder.
All these years, I've been trying to recreate the mutagen.
translation.es: Todos estos años he tratado de recrear el mutágeno.

translation.en: And you?
You just handed it to me.
You will not lay a hand on my sons.
translation.es: No les pondrás ni un dedo encima a mis hijos.

translation.en: Your sons?
You think you're their father?
Very good, rat.
Sensei!
Donnie!
Hang on, Leo! Be right there!
You stupid little girl!
April!
- Sensei! - No, my son, stay back!
Sensei!
Sensei! Dad!
Dad! What are you... What are you doing?
Hide!
Save yourselves!
Children, drop your weapons,
translation.es: Niños, suelten sus armas o su...

translation.en: or your father will die.
translation.es: Niños, suelten sus armas o su... ...padre...morirá.

translation.en: Where's the fourth?  He's dead.
Destroy this place.
Keep moving!
Stay strong.
Remember, pain's only in the mind.
translation.es: Recuerden, el dolor solo existe en la mente.

translation.en: Move along! Go!
Troop, go!
Move! Move!
Splinter.
Sensei.
Master.
Let's get him to the needle room.
translation.es: Vamos al salón de las agujas.

translation.en: Package is secured. En route.
translation.es: Tenemos el paquete. Vamos en camino.

translation.en: We're carrying three specimens and will be arriving at the estate in approximately 40 minutes.
translation.es: Tenemos 3 especímenes y llegaremos en 40 minutos.

translation.en: Prepare the containment units.
Inside those turtles is the most precious compound on Earth...
translation.es: Dentro de esas tortugas está el compuesto más valioso del mundo:

translation.en: mutagen.
translation.es: El mutágeno. Les sacaremos hasta la última gota de sangre...

translation.en: And we will drain every last ounce of their blood to get it,
translation.es: Les sacaremos hasta la última gota de sangre...

translation.en: even if it kills them.
Get the first aid kit! On the shelf!
Hurry. Hurry.
Raphael?
I'm here.
You must save your brothers.
Stop Shredder.
Sensei.
It's some kind of a tracker.
It's Donatello!
Go, Raphael.
Let's go save my brothers.
We need a ride.
O'Neil!
Look, Vern, I need you to meet me at Cortlandt Alley in ten minutes, please.
translation.es: Alcánzame en el Callejón de Cortlandt en 10 minutos.

translation.en: Wait, why?
I can't talk to you about it on the phone. Just promise me you're gonna be there.
translation.es: No te puedo decir por teléfono. Prométeme estar ahí.

translation.en: What do you mean you can't talk about... You called--
translation.es: ¿Cómo que no puedes? Tú me llamaste...

translation.en: All right. Want me to meet you right now?
I'll play your little game.
What's with the hat?
What is with the...  I don't know, it's a buddy of mine. It's just a goof.
translation.es: ¿El sombrero? No sé, es de un amigo. Es una tontería.

translation.en: What do you want to do? You wanna head downtown?
Eric Sacks is working with the head of the Foot Clan.
translation.es: Sacks trabaja con el Clan del Pie.

translation.en: They just kidnapped the vigilante turtles to take them to the Sacks estate. We need to go. Come on, Vern.
translation.es: Raptó a las tortugas y las llevó a su complejo. ¡Hay que ir allá!

translation.en: Right, right, right. The turtles. I forgot.
translation.es: Claro. Las tortugas. Se me olvidó.

translation.en: This is getting embarrassing. O'Neil,
translation.es: Esto se está poniendo ridículo. O'Neil...

translation.en: we're both consenting adults.
We're both very good- looking. You're better, probably.
translation.es: Somos muy bien parecidos. Tú más, probablemente.

translation.en: That's up for debate. But the point is, we don't need to make up excuses - to hang out with each other. - What?
translation.es: Es debatible. No necesitamos excusas para estar juntos.

translation.en: You want to spend more time with me. I get it. I would too.
translation.es: Quieres pasar tiempo conmigo, está bien.

translation.en: We need to get to the Sacks estate right now, Vern. Come on!
That's what I'm talking about, O'Neil. The Sacks estate with the vigilante...
translation.es: De eso hablo: El complejo de Sacks con tortugas...

translation.en: - What-- - Drive!
You... You... You're a talking turtle.
Yeah. Yeah, I'm a talking turtle,
translation.es: Sí, soy una tortuga que habla...

translation.en: and you're a human nerd. Now that we got that out of the way, hit it.
translation.es: ...y tú eres un nerd humano. Ya que aclaramos eso, arranca.

translation.en: I've never been accused of being a nerd before, but... I'm sorry...
translation.es: Nunca me habían llamado nerd pero...disculpa...

translation.en: How did you get in... How did he get in the...
Oh, my!
Unbelievable. Let me look at you.
I'm a hard guy to impress, but...
this is just...  Oh, my God.
And we were gonna use rabbits!
Can you imagine that?
All we were trying to do is create an antidote.
For what?
Say that again. I want to hear your voice.
translation.es: Repite eso. Quiero oír tu voz.

translation.en: For what!
Well, uh, we had this plan.
A plan that we're ready to put back online today.
translation.es: Un plan que estamos listos para volver a activar hoy mismo.

translation.en: I'll show you. Karai, um...
Show them.
Do you know my building, Sacks Tower? Got that great big spire up on top?
translation.es: ¿Conocen la Torre Sacks? Tiene un chapitel enorme arriba.

translation.en: - That spire is filled... -
...with tons of chemical toxins. No! No!
Bad stuff.
That kinda bad.
In a few hours, Shredder is going to unleash all that stuff
translation.es: En unas horas Destructor soltará todas esas sustancias...

translation.en: over the whole city. The initial death toll
translation.es: ...en toda la ciudad. La cuota de muertes...

translation.en: will shake world governments to their core.
translation.es: ...sacudirá a los gobiernos hasta la médula.

translation.en: In 30 days, the city of New York will be a quarantine zone.
translation.es: En 30 días, Nueva York será una zona de cuarentena.

translation.en: And that is where my company comes in.
translation.es: Y ahí es donde entra mi compañía.

translation.en: I'm going to save everyone with the antidote
translation.es: Voy a salvar a todos con el antídoto...

translation.en: that is made from the mutagen that is oozing through your blood.
translation.es: ...hecho del mutágeno que corre por su sangre.

translation.en: The government will then send Sacks Industry a blank check,
translation.es: El gobierno le mandará a Industrias Sacks un cheque en blanco...

translation.en: and I'm going to be rich. Like, stupid rich.
Shredder will force this city to live under our rule.
translation.es: Destructor obligará a la ciudad a vivir bajo nuestro mando.

translation.en: We will be gods.
Yeah, I've thought about... I've thought about doing,
not becoming a ninja, but I was doing a bunch of yoga
translation.es: ...no en ser un ninja, pero me puse a hacer mucha yoga...

translation.en: for like, ten days at one point, and, uh, I pulled a hamstring.
translation.es: ...10 días y me lastimé un tendón.

translation.en: - There's the gate right there. - There it is.
Ram the gate.
Ram the gate? This is Channel 6 property.
I said ram the gate!
All right, everybody, strap in!
Oh, shit!
Follow me!
I'll take this canister to New York to withdraw the mutagen.
translation.es: Llevaré este envase a N.Y. para sacar el mutágeno.

translation.en: Make sure that you drain all their blood.
Time to take a bite out of the Big Apple.
translation.es: Es hora de morder la Gran Manzana.

translation.en: Hey! Get out of here!
Leo!
About time.
Raphael.
Glad you could join us.
The fourth cage is for you.
translation.es: La cuarta jaula es para ti.

translation.en: That's harsh, man.
The rat did not teach you well!
Raphael!
You.
Focus on me.
Three... Four total turtles.
One's fighting a robot samurai. Why not?
translation.es: Una pelea con un robot samurái. ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: Donnie!
What do I do?
- Adrenaline. - What?
Adrenaline.
Adrenaline.
All right. All right.
Adrenaline.
He's going to kill him.
Get up!
It's working.
I think we should move.
Oh! I feel really good right now! I feel like running!
I feel like cleaning! Who wants to clean the dojo? I'll clean the dojo!
translation.es: ¡Tengo ganas de limpiar! ¿Quién quiere limpiar el dojo? ¡Yo!

translation.en: Endorphins! Endorphins!  We got to get Raph!
Are you okay? Are you dead? Are you okay?
Come on. Come on.
- We really gotta go! - Go where?
- Sacks Tower! - New York City! Times Square!
Shredder's going to release a toxin! It's gonna poison the whole city!
translation.es: -¡Va a soltar una toxina! -¡Envenenará a la ciudad!

translation.en: And Sacks is gonna sell the antidote!  Made from the mutagen that's in our blood!
translation.es: -¡Sacks venderá el antídoto! -¡Del mutágeno de nuestra sangre!

translation.en: So we've got to get going now!
Good. Let's do it for sensei.
Okay. We're going!
Everybody calm down! Look how calm I am!
We gotta move. Let's go!
Sacks is airborne!
Flight time to Manhattan, 19 minutes. Get us out of here, Donnie.
translation.es: -¡Llegará a Manhattan en 19 minutos! -¡Sácanos de aquí, Doni!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, they have guns!
- - Get down! Get down!
Ha! Are you guys okay?
- We're bulletproof. - Sweet!
Advance and engage!
- Can you drive that truck? - Yeah!
We're on, Raph. Ready?
Come on!
Everybody in the truck! We gotta go, go, go! Move!
Vern, you know how to drive this, right?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Just gotta hotwire this thing, I guess. Classic blue wire/red wire situation.
translation.es: Sí. Hay que juntar los cables. Son los clásicos rojo y azul.

translation.en: - Keys! - Yeah.
Keys are better.
- Drive! - I'm on it!
Come on, come on!
That's all I need, is a backseat- driving talking turtle!
- Let's go! - Move!
- Jackal- One- Tango, on your 12! - Copy that.
I shouldn't have doubted you. Sorry I didn't stick up for you.
translation.es: No debí dudar de ti. Perdón por no apoyarte.

translation.en: I can't believe that you're not crazy! How crazy is that?
Target, 12 o'clock!
Where are we going, guys?
Donnie, what's the fastest way back to Manhattan?
We just need to stay on this road. If we can get to the maintenance hatch at the bottom of the hill, there's a sewer line 2.4 miles from here.
translation.es: ¡Por aquí! La entrada a la alcantarilla está abajo. A 3,8 km.

translation.en: Mikey! Let them know up there!
I'm on it!
Oh, no.
- Vern, go, go, go, go, go! - I'm on it!
- Vern, hit the brakes! - Wrong way! Wrong way!
Go around! Go, go, go!
- Leo, move, move! - What?
Opposite, opposite!
How far off course are we?
Actually, we're on a bit of a shortcut. But we need to keep going down. Straight down.
translation.es: Este es un pequeño atajo. ¡Pero hay que seguir bajando!

translation.en: Just keep
going straight!
What's up, angel cakes?
Fire!
Guys, Leo's in trouble!
My shell's cracked. Just tape it up.
Allow me to be the bad- ass for once.
translation.es: Déjame ser el temible para variar.

translation.en: Hang on, Leo. Disengaging.
God, I've always wanted to try this.
I got you, brother. One car down, two to go.
translation.es: Te tengo, hermano. ¡Un auto menos, faltan dos!

translation.en: Mikey!
All right, that's it. I'll take it from here!
Raph, I'm driving! Yeah!
O'Neil, what are you doing?
Yeah, that's good. Make sure you're getting everything.
Vern!
Vern!
O'Neil! Give me your arm!
Vern!
Avalanche!
Come on, Leo, wake up!
Yeah! If you wake up, I promise to do anything you say.
translation.es: ¡Si te despiertas, prometo hacer todo lo que me digas!

translation.en: Guys, Shredder's chopper is 20 miles outside of New York City airspace!
translation.es: ¡El helicóptero de Destructor está a 32 km de Nueva York!

translation.en: Thanks for the traffic update, Donnie. You doing sports and weather next?
translation.es: Gracias por las noticias del tráfico. ¿Siguen los deportes?

translation.en: If you're gonna be nasty about it, then I guess you don't want to know that there's a 500- foot drop- off in 53 seconds!
translation.es: ¡Si me sigues criticando, no te diré que caeremos 200 m en 53 segundos!

translation.en: - Are you saying there's-- - A cliff!
We gotta get April out of there. Raph, heads up!
translation.es: ¡Hay que sacar a April de ahí! ¡Rafa, rápido!

translation.en: Don't forget that old guy!
Hi. Change of plans. Oh, come on.
translation.es: Cambio de planes. Ay, por favor.

translation.en: Guys, get down! Get down!
Twelve seconds and we're going over!
Hey, Donnie, do that fancy slingshot thing! We got to take Little Miss Sunshine out.
translation.es: ¡Haz esa cosa que haces! Hay que eliminar a Miss Simpatía.

translation.en: Batter up!
Grab on.
Mikey! Grab the cable!
I got it! I got it!
Hold on, hold on.
Poor Leo, April...
and that other guy. They were so young, so beautiful.
translation.es: ...y el otro tipo. ¡Eran tan jóvenes, tan hermosos!

translation.en: They ain't dead, numb nuts.
Oh. Right on.
I hope you got a parachute under that shell.
Hey, guys! It's the maintenance hatch! Our ticket home!
translation.es: ¡Oigan, es la alcantarilla! ¡Nuestro boleto a casa!

translation.en: A little help, please!
Guys, we gotta hustle. Shredder's over New York City.
Sensei, the mutagen is four minutes out.
translation.es: Sensei, el mutágeno está a 4 minutos.

translation.en: Moving forward as planned.
Please keep your arms and legs inside the shell at all times.
translation.es: Mantengan brazos y piernas dentro del caparazón.

translation.en: Satellite imagery shows Shredder's reached the top of Sacks Tower.
translation.es: La imagen de satélite muestra a Destructor en la Torre Sacks.

translation.en: If that's where he's releasing the toxin from...  It's gonna spread all over the city!
translation.es: -¡Si suelta la toxina...! -¡Se esparcirá en toda la ciudad!

translation.en: - We need to... - ...break a left!
All right, listen up. We gotta find the elevators and get up to the roof.
translation.es: Hay que buscar los ascensores y llegar al techo.

translation.en: You guys get out of here. Get to a safe distance.
translation.es: Uds. pónganse a una distancia segura.

translation.en: No, no, we can go find Sacks and get our hands on the mutagen as a contingency plan,
translation.es: No, podemos buscar a Sacks y agarrar el mutágeno...

translation.en: just in case... You know.
translation.es: ...solo por si las dudas, ya saben.

translation.en: Thanks for the vote of confidence.
translation.es: Gracias por ese voto de confianza.

translation.en: If we don't make it back, bring the mutagen to Splinter. It can save his life.
translation.es: Si no sobrevivimos, llévale el mutágeno a Splinter. Lo puede salvar.

translation.en: Sacks' laboratory's on the 36th floor.
translation.es: El laboratorio está en el piso 36.

translation.en: I've already disabled the security system. Oh, and, uh...
translation.es: Ya desactivé el sistema de seguridad. Y...

translation.en: Good luck!
If I don't return, remember me, April.
You can always find me
in here.
You're a complicated chick.
Elevator's just around this corner.
All right, guys, listen up. We stick to my plan and we won't fail.
translation.es: Si seguimos mi plan, no fracasaremos.

translation.en: Fan out in three, two, one.
Not the elevator.
Nope.
The first vial is filling with antidote now.
Initiating the toxin release procedure.
translation.es: Iniciando proceso para soltar la toxina.

translation.en: MC Mikey
Ready, stance!
Hey, Mikey, remember that thing you used to say when we were kids?
translation.es: Maiki, ¿recuerdas lo que decías de niño?

translation.en: You made me promise never to say it again. Forget about that.
Still got one in the tank?
I've been holding it in for years. Wait, guys, we need a plan!
- Cowabunga! -
Leo!
Yeah, we got a 10- 10. Debris falling from the building.
translation.es: ¡Tenemos una situación! ¡Caen escombros de un edificio!

translation.en: Come on.
I got this, guys. I'll take him.
Come on!
Oh, no, you don't!
Seriously, you two...
translation.es: En serio... ...Uds. son adorables. Me dan ganas de pellizcarles las mejillas.

translation.en: You're adorable, really. I could just pinch your cheeks.
translation.es: ...Uds. son adorables. Me dan ganas de pellizcarles las mejillas.

translation.en: Guys, he's coming, he's coming.
Guys!
- Donnie! -
Come on, come on!
Hold on, Leo!
I understand a girl with dead daddy issues. I do. But you're not gonna stop me.
translation.es: Entiendo que te afectó la muerte de papi. Pero no me vas a parar.

translation.en: This is history repeating itself.
translation.es: Esto es historia... ...que se repite. Tu padre me sorprendió, igual que tú.

translation.en: Your father walked in on me, April, just like you did.
translation.es: ...que se repite. Tu padre me sorprendió, igual que tú.

translation.en: It took a few less bullets to take him down, though.
translation.es: Pero necesité menos balas para matarlo.

translation.en: You killed my father.
Come on, guys.
Got you!
Enough! The lesson is over.
Ugh! We're getting our asses kicked out there.
translation.es: Nos están dando una buena paliza.

translation.en: We only got 50 more seconds before the toxin's released.
translation.es: Tenemos 50 segundos antes de que suelten la toxina.

translation.en: - Who wants to play Buck- Buck? - Buck- Buck?
- What? - Buck- Buck. Tony- on- a- Pony. Some people call it Johnnie- on- a- Rock.
translation.es: Salta al burro, Tony en el potro, Johnny salta la roca.

translation.en: Wait.
Yeah.
Let's play Buck- Buck.
- But why would we... - No.
We do what Leo says.
Lead the way.
O'Neil!
Cowabunga.
Are you okay?
Look, just go get some help and take the mutagen with you.
translation.es: ¡Ve a pedir ayuda! Llévate el mutágeno.

translation.en: - Just go. Go! - No!
Just another day in the life of a man of action.
translation.es: Otro día en la vida de un hombre de acción.

translation.en: Oh! No, I'm not getting up.
You know how to use this thing?
It's a simple command- line interface.
No one's used this code in 15 years. I mean, I've read about it online.
translation.es: Este código es obsoleto. He leído sobre él.

translation.en: But these kind of things take time.
Thinking there was no way I'd ever be in a position
translation.es: Nunca pensé que el destino de una ciudad...

translation.en: I'll buy you some time.
Toxin disbursement in five, four...
...three,
two...
Bam! System disabled! Who wants Italian? I'm buying. Tiramisu for everybody.
Fall in!
Hold on! Hold it, hold it!
If the spire falls and the toxin makes ground impact, it'll contaminate a ten- block radius!
translation.es: ¡Si el chapitel se cae, la toxina contaminará un radio de 10 cuadras!

translation.en: What are the odds of us stopping that from happening?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas probabilidades hay de evitar que pase?

translation.en: I'll take it. Nobody moves, no matter what.
translation.es: Me gustan. Que nadie se mueva, pase lo que pase.

translation.en: But, Leo...  I said nobody moves!
Leo, I'm letting go!
Shredder!
This is all that's left!
Little girl.
That belongs to me.
Hold on! Hold on! Hold it!
Get back! All the way back!
April!
Come on, guys.
- - No!  April!
Got you, Raph.
Hold on! Hold on. April.
I got you.
Swing me towards him!
Do it.
Leo!
That's my girl.
I think this is it, guys!
Does anyone have anything they want to say?
Donnie?
I'm the one who licks the icing off the Pop- Tarts every morning and puts them back in the box.
translation.es: Lamo el azúcar de los pastelitos y los vuelvo a meter en la caja.

translation.en: I so did not understand the ending of Lost.
translation.es: Nunca entendí el final de Lost.

translation.en: Raph?
I just, uh...
If this is our last moment together,
translation.es: Si este es nuestro último momento juntos...

translation.en: I just want you guys to know I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I was so hard on you.
translation.es: Lamento haber sido tan duro con Uds.

translation.en: Every time I pushed you, I... I threatened you,
translation.es: ¡Cada vez que los empujé, que los amenacé...

translation.en: I yelled at you, I pushed you beyond your limits, it was because I believe in you!
translation.es: ...que les grité y los presioné, fue porque creía en ustedes!

translation.en: I believe in each one of you! I believe in your spirit, and your intelligence,
translation.es: ¡Creo en cada uno de Uds.! ¡Creo en su espíritu y su inteligencia...

translation.en: and your potential.
And every time I talked about walking away, it was because I was scared!
translation.es: ¡Cada vez que decía que los iba a dejar era porque tenía miedo!

translation.en: I just didn't think I was good enough to stand next to you
translation.es: No creía estar a su altura...

translation.en: and call you brothers, and say to you,
I love you!
I love you guys so much!
Raph?
We made it.
Are you crying?
No, ding- dong. It's just a little dusty out here.
translation.es: No, zopenco. Aquí hay un poco de polvo.

translation.en: Okay, the mutagen is now entering his bloodstream.
translation.es: El mutágeno está entrando en su sangre.

translation.en: Master Splinter? Nothing's happening.
Why isn't it working yet?
Mikey...
- Huh? - Mikey, come closer.
What did he say? What did he say?
He said, Please get your knee off my chest.
translation.es: Por favor quítame la rodilla del pecho.

translation.en: - - Sensei!
You're alive! It worked!
I'm sorry. This was all my fault.
translation.es: Perdón. Todo fue por culpa mía.

translation.en: You were right. We weren't ready.
It was I who wasn't ready to let you go.
translation.es: Yo era el que no estaba listo...para soltarlos.

translation.en: All you needed was to discover
that your true power lies in believing in one another.
translation.es: ...que su verdadero poder está en creer el uno en el otro.

translation.en: There she is.
New York's secret weapon.
translation.es: El arma secreta de Nueva York.

translation.en: How's your arm, Vern?
Well, it wouldn't be much use in a fight. Not that I was much use before, but...
translation.es: No me servirá en una pelea. Pero nunca fui bueno para pelear.

translation.en: - Did you get a new car? - Yeah.
You're looking at the new Fenwick Express.
translation.es: Estás viendo el nuevo Expreso Fenwick. Lindo, ¿no?

translation.en: Pretty sweet, huh? Kind of an upgrade. I figured I'd need new wheels after my old work vehicle went boom.
translation.es: Es mucho mejor. Lo necesitaba porque perdí mi camioneta.

translation.en: Yeah, Channel 6 gave it to me. They said don't put a scratch on it, but, like, lightning's going to strike twice?
translation.es: Es del Canal. Dijeron que lo cuidara, pero un rayo no cae dos veces.

translation.en: So, is that why you called me here, to talk about your new car?
translation.es: ¿Por eso querías que viniera? ¿Para hablar de tu nuevo auto?

translation.en: I know that you're not exactly a fancy restaurant kind of girl,
translation.es: Sé que no eres aficionada a los restaurantes elegantes y pensé...

translation.en: so I figured a creepy underpass in an abandoned neighborhood
translation.es: Sé que no eres aficionada a los restaurantes elegantes y pensé... ...que un túnel tenebroso a medianoche sería más de tu estilo.

translation.en: in the middle of the night was more your speed.
translation.es: ...que un túnel tenebroso a medianoche sería más de tu estilo.

translation.en: I wanted you to be comfortable.
DJ Mikey in the house!
What are you guys doing here?
We figured we owed you a thanks for keeping our secret.
translation.es: Queríamos darte las gracias por guardar nuestro secreto.

translation.en: You know, you had a lot to gain from telling people about us, but you had our backs.
translation.es: Tenías mucho que ganar hablando de nosotros, pero nos protegiste.

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause that's what family's for, Raph.
translation.es: Sí, para eso está la familia, Rafa.

translation.en: So you guys are driving now?
Yeah, man. I pimped this bad boy out.
translation.es: Esta maravilla tiene una tele de 1,06 metros...

translation.en: Got a 42- inch plasma with the NBA package, shave ice machine,
translation.es: Esta maravilla tiene una tele de 1,06 metros... ...paquete de básquetbol, máquina de hielo, sonido surround.

translation.en: 7.1 digital surround sound.
translation.es: ...paquete de básquetbol, máquina de hielo, sonido surround.

translation.en: Check the bass, brah.
My bad. I'm still figuring out the buttons.
translation.es: Perdón. Aún no conozco los botones.

translation.en: That was my new Fenwick Express! I just... I just got that.
translation.es: ¡Era mi nuevo Expreso Fenwick! ¡Me lo acaban de entregar!

translation.en: We better get out of here. Want a ride home?
translation.es: Mejor nos vamos. ¿Los llevo a su casa?

translation.en: You know what? I think we're gonna take the subway.
We're going to take the subway.
You sure?
I got a real nice song that's all cued up. - It's special, girl. - No, don't.
translation.es: Tengo una canción linda, muy especial.

translation.en: - For us. - Come on, Mikey.
No, no, no, Mikey, you promised.
I'm making really good headway!  Shut up, Mikey!
- - I can't see me Loving nobody but you
translation.es: No me imagino poder amar a nadie más que tú

translation.en: For all my life
When you're with me, baby
The skies'll be blue For all my life!
translation.es: El cielo estará siempre azul Por toda mi vida

translation.en: Sayin' we gone As soon as we save 'em
